titles.title: Expressing support for Congress to focus on artificial intelligence.
Expressing support for Congress to focus on artificial intelligence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: This resolution supports a congressional focus on artificial intelligence (AI) to ensure (1) it is developed in a safe and ethical manner that respects the rights and privacy of Americans, and (2) a wide distribution of AI benefits and minimization of risks.
